text:
(upbeat music)
- My name is Wasim Hossain.

I work with customers from all
different types of industries
to help in their cloud-migration journey.

Before this, I was at a large
telecommunications company.

I was helping them with
digital transformation,

and it is something that
I really love to do.

And that's what really
attracted me to this role.

Now I get to do the same
thing, but for customers

from all different types of
industries and backgrounds.
I love my job because I get to work

with some of the brightest
minds in the industry.

Being at Amazon, you are
exposed to the most cutting edge

and I've never been in a place
where you've learned so much
in such a short amount of time.
